Articles.Content: I’m not sure if this is on every planet but I found my rover whether they have the small wheels or the big Will while I’m driving the clip into the ground and flip the whole rover over even when I’m not using timewarp. Which makes driving rovers and exploring planets almost impossible

12 hours ago, Deekyn Bray said:

I’m not sure if this is on every planet but I found my rover whether they have the small wheels or the big Will while I’m driving the clip into the ground and flip the whole rover over even when I’m not using timewarp. Which makes driving rovers and exploring planets almost impossible

There appears to be an issue with wheels appearing to hit something on the ground. closest thing I could compare it to is a person stubbing their toe and stumbling.

I have noticed it on Kerbin and at least one other planets.
